trans-unit.source: Defines a set of logical counters.
trans-unit.target: 定义一组逻辑计数器。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished to remove your provider's registration and to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.Dispose%2A>方法完成后，删除你的提供程序注册并释放所有托管和非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>。

trans-unit.source: Guid that uniquely identifies the provider of the counter data.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识计数器数据的提供程序的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Use the Guid specified in the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 请使用清单中指定的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Guid that uniquely identifies the counter set for a provider.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识提供程序的计数器集的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Use the Guid specified in the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 请使用清单中指定的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of the counter set, for example, whether the counter set is a single or multiple instance counter set.
trans-unit.target: 标识计数器集的类型，例如，计数器集是单实例还是多实例计数器集。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Registers your provider.
trans-unit.target: 注册你的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.Dispose%2A> method removes the registration.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.Dispose%2A>方法删除的注册。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>。

trans-unit.source: Not enough memory is available to complete the operation.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的可用内存来完成该操作。

trans-unit.source: Not supported prior to Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 之前的操作系统中不受支持。

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters is NULL or not valid.
trans-unit.target: 其中某个参数为 NULL 或无效。

trans-unit.source: An underlying Win32 function call failed.
trans-unit.target: 基础 Win32 函数调用失败。

trans-unit.source: Adds a counter to the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 向计数器集中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the counter.
trans-unit.target: 标识计数器。

trans-unit.source: Use the same value that you used in the manifest to define the counter.
trans-unit.target: 使用在清单中所用的值来定义计数器。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the counter type.
trans-unit.target: 标识计数器类型。

trans-unit.source: The counter type determines how the counter data is calculated, averaged, and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 计数器类型用来确定如何计算和显示计数器数据以及如何对其求平均值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a counter to the counter set by using the specified counter identifier and type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的计数器标识符和类型向计数器集中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 在为计数器集创建实例之前，必须先向其中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: The counter identifier already exists in the set or is negative, or the counter type is NULL or not valid.
trans-unit.target: 计数器标识符已经存在于计数器集中、计数器标识符为负数，或者计数器类型为 NULL 或无效。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add counters to the counter set after creating an instance of the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 在为计数器集创建实例之后，将无法向其中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the counter.
trans-unit.target: 标识计数器。

trans-unit.source: Use the same value that you used in the manifest to define the counter.
trans-unit.target: 使用在清单中所用的值来定义计数器。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the counter type.
trans-unit.target: 标识计数器类型。

trans-unit.source: The counter type determines how the counter data is calculated, averaged, and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 计数器类型用来确定如何计算和显示计数器数据以及如何对其求平均值。

trans-unit.source: Name of the counter.
trans-unit.target: 计数器的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can use this name to index the counter in the counter set instance.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此名称来为该计数器集实例中的计数器编制索引。

trans-unit.source: (See <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item(System.String)" />.)
trans-unit.target: （请参阅<see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item(System.String)" />。）

trans-unit.source: Adds a counter to the counter set by using the specified counter identifier and type and a display name for the counter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的计数器标识符和类型以及计数器的显示名称向计数器集中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 在为计数器集创建实例之前，必须先向其中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>。

trans-unit.source: The counter identifier already exists in the set or is negative, or the counter type is NULL or not valid.
trans-unit.target: 计数器标识符已经存在于计数器集中、计数器标识符为负数，或者计数器类型为 NULL 或无效。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add counters to the counter set after creating an instance of the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 在为计数器集创建实例之后，将无法向其中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: Name of the instance.
trans-unit.target: 实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 该名称必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 创建计数器集的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the counter set which will contain the counter data.
trans-unit.target: 将包含计数器数据的计数器集的实例。

trans-unit.source: Call this method one time for single-instance counter sets and one or more times for multiple-instance counter sets.
trans-unit.target: 对于单实例计数器集和一个或多个时间对于多个实例计数器集，调用此方法一次。

trans-unit.source: The provider determines when it creates an instance.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序确定在创建实例时。

trans-unit.source: If the counter data is more static, the provider can create an instance at initialization time.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个静态的计数器数据，提供程序可以在初始化时创建实例。

trans-unit.source: For example, the number of processors on a computer would be considered static, so a provider that provides counter data for processors could create an instance for each processor on the computer at initialization time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一台计算机上的处理器数目将被视为静态的因此为处理器提供计数器数据提供程序无法为每个处理器实例创建的计算机上，在初始化时。

trans-unit.source: For counters that are more dynamic, such as disk or process counters, the providers would create the new instances in response to a new USB device being added or a new process being created.
trans-unit.target: 对于动态程度较高，如磁盘或进程计数器的计数器，提供程序将根据要添加的新的 USB 设备或正在创建一个新进程创建的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The provider should keep the counter data up-to-date at all times.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应该保留在任何时候都有最新的数据的计数器。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData>。

trans-unit.source: The instance name is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 实例名称为 NULL。

trans-unit.source: You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 在为计数器集创建实例之前，必须先向其中添加计数器。

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by this object.
trans-unit.target: 释放此对象使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all unmanaged resources used by this object.
trans-unit.target: 释放此对象使用的所有非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if this was called from the Dispose method, <see langword="False" /> if called from the finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是从 Dispose 方法调用的，则为 <see langword="True" />；如果是从终结器调用的，则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all unmanaged resources used by this object and optionally release the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放此对象使用的所有非托管资源，并可选择释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Frees resources before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在垃圾回收功能将对象回收之前，释放资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called automatically by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 运行时自动调用此方法。
